column5: Best video ever that captures the fly in experience and the beauty of NW Ontario. It was clearly produced by a professional. It hits home to me since I've used Kabeelo for years and know the planes, the scenery etc. The takeoff is from the air base on Confederation Lake, but I'm not sure which of the outposts they're landing on (it's not a lake I've been to, I know that). Hope this video excites you for your own Canada trip, wherever that may be. 70 days and counting before I will be doing this, and time is moving very slowly right now...http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cSxZzfn4pZI
Great video, unfortunately have to wait for September.
Was the takeoff from Minnitaki? Great, great footage. Can't wait to get up there. Only 13 days till I leave and 17 days till I will be on the water.
My bad. Reread and saw Confederation Lake. All Ontario water looks good.
Anyone know what the background music was. Really fit.
It left off the best part, the sound of the engine on takeoff.
Lived in Pickle Lake quite a few years, and like skywagon mentioned one of the things i miss believe it or not is the 5 am takeoffs Mike
They did a good job with that video. Nothing gives me that feeling of longing like a video of northern Ontario.
